messages.title: Plans by the Labour Party
messages.content: You will be aware of plans by the Labour Party to build a council estate on Bellburn Lane field if they win in May's elections.

messages.title: Local Green Space
messages.content: I have fully taken on board the degree of concern you feel about these proposals for replacing your local green space with a council estate.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Peter Cuthbertson is committed to opposing the proposals to replace the Bellburn Lane field with a council estate, stressing the importance of the field for socialising, walking dogs, playing football, and children's play.

mentions.tacticalSituation: This is the last chance to elect a new set of representatives who will protect Bellburn Lane field.

issues.environment: The field is widely used for socializing, walking dogs, playing football and children's play. It is the only area of its kind for some distance, worth preserving.

housing.content: Proposal to build a council estate on Bellburn Lane field.

leaflet.personalStatement: I am writing to say I am 100% on your side. Like Richard Grundy, Rachel Mills and Chris Wells (the local Conservative council candidates), I am completely opposed to these proposals.

endorsements.endorser: Richard Grundy, Rachel Mills and Chris Wells
endorsements.endorsement: Showing united opposition to Labour's plans alongside other Conservative council candidates.

images.caption: Flyer discussing the opposition to Labour's plan to build on Bellburn Lane field.
